name: shallow
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: shallow
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: having only a short distance from the top to the bottom

example.eg: The stream was fairly shallow so we were able to walk across it.
example.egtrans: 小溪很浅，所以我们可以趟水过去。

example.eg: She told her children to stay in the shallow end (of the swimming pool).
example.egtrans: 她叫孩子们留在（游泳池的）浅水区。

example.eg: Fry the onions in a shallow pan.
example.egtrans: 用浅平底锅把洋葱煎一下。

example.eg: These beech trees have shallow roots (= roots which do not go very deep into the ground).

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: breathing in which you only take a small amount of air into your lungs with each breath

dsense.name: shallow
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: not showing serious or careful thought

example.eg: I thought the film was pretty shallow.
example.egtrans: 我认为这部电影很肤浅。
他外表吸引人，但是内心肤浅。

name: shallow
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: the shallow part of an area of water
